summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; authorizing agreements for financial assistance from the Transportation Improvement Board for the North and Northwest Market Street Improvement Project; authorizing preconstruction and right-of-way activities; making appropriations from the Cumulative Reserve Fund and the Cumulative Reserve Major Maintenance and Renovation Sub-fund; making a reimbursable appropriation from the Transportation Improvement Fund and a partially reimbursable appropriation from the Arterial City Street Fund and accepting the money when received.
